text.div:
Argonaut Immunization Status

Immunization codes constrained from the STU3 core to include only 'completed' and 'enter-in-error' which are the only two clinically relevent values.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/medication-admin-status
    CodeDisplay
    completedCompletedAll actions that are implied by the administration have occurred.
    entered-in-errorEntered in ErrorThe administration was entered in error and therefore nullified.

name: Argonaut Immunization Status
description: Immunization codes constrained from the STU3 core to include only 'completed' and 'enter-in-error'  which are the only two clinically relevent values.
purpose: Codes that may be used for implementation of the Argonaut Immunization IG and MU2015 certification.

designation.value: All actions that are implied by the administration have occurred
The administration was entered in error and therefore nullified
